body: Whats up with the new extra story. Did Ashton leave? Or is it an alternate ending where he doesnt become a vampire and just leaves and dies a human and the little girl Ghiselle finds is his daughter?
WOOOOO the greatest doujin got a full colour! The “plot” and plot are too great ! When the translation comes out, the world will be shaken. LeL
Ya'll lookin' forward to what 2021 has instore because of this? cause I am, a good old classic masterpiece being remade and extended? Hell yes I'm looking forward to it.

Love the color and the expansion of the story, and I already thought the original was a classic by hentai standards. But a couple panels had a greater expressiveness that I think worked better in the original rough. Like in the original Page 111, that glare the vampire made looked downright inhumanly evil, but here she looks much less angry. It made the conflicting emotions of the scene more vivid and made it more tangible what a villain Giselle is behind the cutesy disposition. 

Both are great though, guess it's best that both versions have some touches to make them worth checking out.
